name: RPOL.net Leopard-Skin Blue Style
description:
A leopard-skin theme for RPOL.net using dark backgrounds, white type and cyan links.

This theme has been updated to work with the latest version of RPOL (RuBB v.1.9.54).
additional_info: This web theme's background uses an edited version of a pattern under license from Obsidian Dawn (www.obsidiandawn.com). If attributing, please also make reference to obsidiandawn.com.
